comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for identifying him - it looks as though one "n" was missed in the identification on the negative, though both "n's" made it onto a portrait of him, also in the Bain Collection, where you also identified him: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5169002565/ . We'll adjust the description when we next update.
